thread.title: Siddarth announces his next officially | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Siddarth announces his next officially | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Siddarth announces his next officially | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 23, 2015, 23.59 pm Siddharth Putting all speculation to rest, Siddharth has announced the details of his next project. The actor took to Twitter to spill the beans, posting, “Dear all. My next film in Tamil, Etaki Entertainment presents Deeraj Vaidy’s Jil Jung Juk. A high-octane action comedy! More info soon!” Though it was reported earlier, there hasn’t been any official confirmation from the crew because they are keeping all information regarding the movie under wraps. According to a source, the film does not have a female lead and the team has completed the shooting of the film. The film is Siddharth’s maiden production venture under Etaki Entertainment.
